questions.location: Where is the bluish discoloration? (lips, fingers, all over)
questions.medical_history: Do you have heart or lung disease?
questions.oxygen_saturation: If you have a pulse oximeter, what is your oxygen level?

triage_rules.expression: 'lips' in str(location).lower() or 'all over' in str(location).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Central cyanosis - Severe hypoxia - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Cyanosis with breathing difficulty - Emergency care required
